message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.DB 

The paper discusses privacy concerns related to personal information available on the internet and proposes a framework for automating the right to be forgotten. This involves natural language processing and image recognition techniques, which are commonly used in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). The framework also involves privacy-preserving mechanisms, which are relevant to cybersecurity (cs.CR) and cryptography (cs.CY). Finally, the framework deals with indexing and managing large amounts of data, which is related to database systems (cs.DB).
